## gpioGetMode() function

Returns the GPIO mode.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare function gpioGetMode(handle: number, gpio: number): GpioMode;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  handle | number | The GPIO device handle as returned by [gpiochipOpen()](./lgpio.gpiochipopen.md) |
|  gpio | number | The GPIO number |

<b>Returns:</b>

[GpioMode](./lgpio.gpiomode.md)

The GPIO mode
